description: '''Shakila Sharma''' (known as '''Shakila Zafar'''; born 28 February 1962) is a Bangladeshi singer. Zafar's career began as a result of her appearance in the 1983 [[Bangladesh Television|BTV]] program ''[[Jodi Kichu Mone Na Koren]]'' where she performed an [[astrology]] themed song "Tula Rashir Meye".
